Posts.Content: belly wrote: Hi I am new to this...But my question is my surgeon found a suspicious node in my arm after a masectomy that I had in feb 2011. Because there are no images as yet as I no longer require a mammogram he used ultra sound. He wants me back in two months to see if it grows. How fast can a tumour grow in 8 weeks? I was first diagnoised in april 2008 er - pro - her + grade 3 T2 ducticle type from memory. I had a bilateral mascetomy, radiothearpy, chemo and herceptin Dx 4/2008, DCIS, 3cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 1/9 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: recurrance after masetomy? belly tninalabama
